title: Apple pushes fragile stock market rally with longest streak since before iPhone launch
content:
While the US stock market has been improving during the month of March, there’s a clear leader – Apple. Reported by Bloomberg, the Cupertino company gained for 11 straight trading days on the NYSE. This is its longest streak since 2003  – before the first iPhone launched. Apple is also nearing a $3 trillion market cap.

more…

The post Apple pushes fragile stock market rally with longest streak since before iPhone launch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Investors are flocking toward big tech as Apple has seen its longest stock market streak since 2003 - before the first iPhone even launched.
